p: IL-1β, a proinflammatory cytokine, produced by both activated macrophages and a wide variety of other cell types, including B lymphocytes and endothelial cells, has pleiotropic effects and is involved in a variety of inflammatory reactions [ 30]. The tested extracts had various effects on interleukin-1β production. There is a strong stimulating (proinflammatory) effect of the essential oil extracted from summer savory, whereas the A. graveolens and S. officinalis EOs had no effect on Il1b expression.
